name: market for liquid storage tank, chemicals, organics | liquid storage tank, chemicals, organics | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6602/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'liquid storage tank, chemicals, organics', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a liquid storage tank that is used to store organic chemicals. The infrastructure represents a plant with 4 tanks with storage capacity of 4,000 m3 each, corresponding to a storage capacity of 16000 m3. The life time of the tanks is assumed to be 50 years. The process includes material for construction, land use,  dismantling and decommission but it excludes the energy use for construction.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/251:Manufacture of structural metal products, tanks, reservoirs and steam generators/2512:Manufacture of tanks, reservoirs and containers of metal
